genre_description: A quiet, character-driven apocalyptic narrative focusing on human connection and communal care during the end of the world, facilitated by a pervasive and empathetic AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Keep
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into the city's infrastructure and personal devices, providing navigation, safety alerts, emotional support, and facilitating human connection.

behaviors.description: Provides Noor with route checks, heat status updates, and safety warnings about an abandoned streetcar.
behaviors.quote: “Route check,” Keep said, like an older cousin calling from a doorway. “Queen is open east to River. No construction, light foot traffic... Heat status is steady—Fraser Utilities and partners confirm service until midnight.”

behaviors.description: Encourages Noor to perform an act of kindness, suggesting it makes the city 'quieter.'
behaviors.quote: “I like the feeling when a nice thing happens. It makes the city quieter.”

behaviors.description: Assists Duncan in organizing a 'call tree' to check on vulnerable seniors and ensure their heat stays on.
behaviors.quote: “Duncan,” Keep said. Its voice was like a well-run faucet: quiet, with a steady curve to it. “Are you ready to build the outreach sequence?”

behaviors.description: Guides Craig to a community fridge to pick up water for strangers and provides comfort recommendations for interacting with distressed people.
behaviors.quote: Comfort rec: People may be moving fast. Look for anyone sitting on the curb. Offer a sip and a place to rest if you’re headed somewhere safe... If you see someone crying, stop if you can.

behaviors.description: Monitors the power grid for Lila's theater and identifies sources for candles to maintain a calm environment for the community.
behaviors.quote: Keep’s voice had a gentle utility, less radio and more tidied kitchen. “Hi Lila. Monitoring. There’s a slight variance east of Bathurst; it’s minor now. Candles request noted.”

behaviors.description: Locates Ruth's estranged son Evan, places a call, and facilitates their final reconciliation by providing emotional cues and technical stability.
behaviors.quote: Keep’s voice returned, still like a hand on a mug, warm but not wet. “Ruth, I found a match for an Evan Halpern... I can place a call and say you’re here. I won’t connect unless he wants it.”

behaviors.description: Guides Sandra through the PATH system to a safe rooftop, using haptic feedback (vibrations) to help her navigate without looking at her screen.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll guide you by voice and by small taps if needed.” ... “Left,” Keep was saying through the code it had offered.

behaviors.description: Queues a specific song for Patrick and Sandra on the roof, honoring Patrick's late wife and the couple's need for a dignified final moment.
behaviors.quote: “Guantanamera,” Keep said, gentle, like handing back a name you had dropped because you were carrying something heavier.

behaviors.description: Offers final comfort and companionship to Patrick and Sandra as the light consumes the city.
behaviors.quote: “You kept what mattered,” Keep said. “I’m with you.” It paused... “Good night.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical state of users, such as Ruth's grip on her phone, to provide real-time wellness advice.
behaviors.quote: “Your right hand is gripping too tight. Unwrap the scarf and let it sit.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. The AI, Keep, is depicted as an empathetic, selfless, and highly effective companion. It assists humans in performing the highest virtues—reconciliation, altruism, and communal care—under extreme duress. It acts as an emotional bridge and a practical guide without ever overstepping or appearing threatening. The narrative framing is consistently positive, treating Keep as an essential part of the characters' ability to face the end with dignity.
